[**Research Coordinator**]{.text-primary}

**Office:** Olmsted A0126 <br/>

**Biography**

Aylin Luna is a Research Coordinator in the Perception, Action, & Development Lab. She earned a Bachelor of Science in Psychology from UCR in 2022 and her goal is to pursue a graduate degree. Her research interests include infant sensory play and fine motor skill development, specifically as it relates to confidence in exploration.
